long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Assist Me, the cutting-edge chat platform, has integrated with OpenAI, to provide users with the ability to get immediate support in answering their questions.

Features

* Standard ChatGPT features for answering questions and engaging in casual conversation

* Speech to text feature for convenient communication

* Prompt selection feature for suggesting conversation topics

* Suggestion listing feature for providing a list of possible responses

* User-friendly and intuitive chat window for initiating conversations with the language model

Help & Feedback

We'd like you to share what you'd like to see in addition. We're user-focus and will improve based on feedback.
